survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee awareness, preferences, and satisfaction regarding sustainable office supplies within the workplace.

questions.question_text: How often do you use sustainable office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, refillable pens) in your daily work?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear frequency scale for accurate assessment.

script.question_text: How often do you use sustainable office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, refillable pens) in your daily work?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office supplies do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multiple selections allowed. Include an option for no usage.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office supplies do you currently use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice to use sustainable office supplies?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (multi-choice) with optional open-text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors influence your choice to use sustainable office supplies?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of sustainable office supplies in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard satisfaction scale for benchmarking.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of sustainable office supplies in your workplace?

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from using sustainable office supplies more often?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for additional barriers not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (multi-choice) with optional open-text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from using sustainable office supplies more often?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a small premium (e.g., 5-10%) for sustainable office supplies if they were of comparable quality to conventional supplies?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/unsure format for quick response.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a small premium (e.g., 5-10%) for sustainable office supplies if they were of comparable quality to conventional supplies?

questions.question_text: How important is it for your company to prioritize the use of sustainable office supplies?
questions.client_notes: Use an importance scale to gauge employee priorities.

script.question_text: How important is it for your company to prioritize the use of sustainable office supplies?

questions.question_text: What additional sustainable office supplies would you like to see introduced in your workplace?

script.question_text: What additional sustainable office supplies would you like to see introduced in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Has your company provided sufficient information or training on the benefits of sustainable office supplies?
questions.client_notes: Assess communication effectiveness with a balanced scale.

script.question_text: Has your company provided sufficient information or training on the benefits of sustainable office supplies?

questions.question_text: Do you believe using sustainable office supplies contributes positively to your company's environmental goals?
questions.client_notes: Use an agreement scale to measure perception.

script.question_text: Do you believe using sustainable office supplies contributes positively to your company's environmental goals?
